description: Transactions exceeding $10,000 must be reported to the compliance department within 24 hours
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE Amount_Paid > 10000

description: Large Wire Transfer Monitoring - All wire transfers where the Amount_Paid exceeds USD 50,000 in a single transaction must be flagged for enhanced due diligence.
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE Amount_Paid > 50000 AND Payment_Format = 'Wire'

description: Wire transfers to or from high-risk jurisdictions exceeding $5,000 must be reported
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE Amount_Paid > 5000 AND (From_Bank IN (SELECT Jurisdiction FROM high_risk_jurisdictions) OR To_Bank IN (SELECT Jurisdiction FROM high_risk_jurisdictions)) AND Payment_Format = 'Wire Transfer'

description: High-Value Reinvestment Transactions - Any transaction classified as Payment_Format = 'Reinvestment' where the Amount_Paid exceeds USD 25,000 must be escalated to the compliance officer for manual review within 48 hours.
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE Amount_Paid > 25000 AND Payment_Format = 'Reinvestment'

description: Currency Conversion Mismatch Alert
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE Payment_Currency != Receiving_Currency AND Amount_Paid > 5000;

description: High-Risk Jurisdiction Transfers - Transfers originating from or destined to banks in high-risk jurisdictions where the amount exceeds USD 1,000 must be automatically flagged pending review.
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE Amount_Paid > 1000 AND (From_Bank IN (SELECT bank FROM high_risk_jurisdictions) OR To_Bank IN (SELECT bank FROM high_risk_jurisdictions))

description: Rapid Cross-Currency Round-Trip - Transactions where the Amount_Received deviates by more than 15 percent from Amount_Paid (after FX normalisation) may indicate layering.
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE Amount_Received != Amount_Paid * 0.85

description: All customer records must be maintained for at least 5 years after the relationship ends
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM customer_records WHERE Relationship_End_Date IS NOT NULL AND DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, Relationship_End_Date) >= 5*365

description: Round-Number Transaction Pattern - Transactions where Amount_Paid is an exact multiple of 1000 and Amount_Paid >= 5000 are statistically overrepresented in confirmed laundering cases.
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE Amount_Paid >= 5000 AND Amount_Paid % 1000 = 0

description: Cheque Transactions Above Threshold - Any cheque-based payment exceeding USD 15,000 must be verified against the account holder identity.
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE Amount_Paid > 15000 AND Payment_Format = 'Cheque'

description: Credit Card Large Purchases - Credit card transactions exceeding USD 8,000 in a single transaction must be reviewed for potential card-not-present fraud.
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE Amount_Paid > 8000 AND Payment_Format = 'Credit Card'

description: ACH High-Value Transfers - ACH transfers from a single account totalling more than USD 100,000 within a 7-day period constitute a high-risk aggregation pattern.
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE Payment_Format = 'ACH' AND Amount_Paid > 10000

description: Known Laundering Transaction Audit - All confirmed laundering transactions
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE Is_Laundering = 1

description: Suspicious activities must be reported to the compliance department within 24 hours of detection
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, Detection_Date) * 24 + HOUR(CURRENT_TIME) - HOUR(Detection_Time) > 24 AND Report_Status IS NULL

description: Compliance breaches must be reported to senior management within 48 hours of detection
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM compliance_breaches WHERE DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, Detection_Date) * 24 + HOUR(CURRENT_TIME) - HOUR(Detection_Time) > 48 AND Management_Report_Status IS NULL

description: Suspicious Activity Reports (SARs) must be filed with FinCEN when required
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE SAR_Required = 'Yes' AND SAR_Filed_Status IS NULL

description: Enhanced due diligence is required for customers from high-risk jurisdictions
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM customer_due_diligence WHERE Customer_Jurisdiction IN (SELECT Jurisdiction FROM high_risk_jurisdictions) AND Due_Diligence_Level != 'Enhanced'

description: Transactions involving high-risk jurisdictions are subject to enhanced monitoring
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE (From_Bank IN (SELECT Jurisdiction FROM high_risk_jurisdictions) OR To_Bank IN (SELECT Jurisdiction FROM high_risk_jurisdictions)) AND Monitoring_Level < 'Enhanced'

description: Politically Exposed Persons (PEPs) must be identified during the customer onboarding process
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM customer_onboarding WHERE PEP_Status IS NULL OR PEP_Status = 'Unknown'

description: Senior management approval is required for PEP relationships
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM pep_relationships WHERE PEP_Approval_Status != 'Approved'

description: Any transaction that appears to be structured to avoid reporting thresholds must be reported as suspicious
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE Transaction_Structuring_Score > 0.7 AND Is_Suspicious = 'No'

description: Transactions with no apparent economic purpose or business rationale should be reported as suspicious
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE Economic_Purpose_Score > 0.8 AND Is_Suspicious = 'No'

description: Transactions involving shell companies or entities with opaque ownership structures should be reported as suspicious
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE Ownership_Transparency_Score > 0.7 AND Is_Suspicious = 'No'
